user.title: Connect to WhatsApp Bridge
user.description:
Enter the connection details for your whatsapp-web.js bridge server.

⚠️ If using the HA add-on, set the host to your HA machine's IP (e.g. `192.168.1.10`) or `homeassistant.local` — **not** `localhost`.

reconfigure.title: Reconfigure WhatsApp Bridge
reconfigure.description: Update the connection details. If using the HA add-on, use your HA machine's IP or `homeassistant.local` — not `localhost`.

error.cannot_connect: Cannot connect to the bridge. Check the host/port and make sure the add-on is running.
error.unknown: Unexpected error. Check your Home Assistant logs.
